lead_paragraph: Miles Redd has made a career out of his love for custom flounce and flourish. So how did he end up with an Ikea-filled bungalow on Fire Island?

headline.main: One Lavish Decorator’s Super Simple Beach Retreat

snippet: Miles Redd has made a career out of his love for custom flounce and flourish. So how did he end up with an Ikea-filled bungalow on Fire Island?...
abstract: Miles Redd, interior designer known for flourishes of color, pattern and accessory, maintains uncharacteristically minimal bungalow on Fire Island.
